advancements.alchemists_garden_base.desc: You woke up in a magical world with a strange letter in your inventory... What's going on here?
advancements.bezoar_stone_advancement.de: Obtain a Bezoar stone by feeding enough Sthirn Bushes to a Sheep.
advancements.breaking_gnome_burrow.descr: Wake up a sleeping gnome by destroying their burrow.
advancements.breaking_gnome_burrow.title: You've been gnomed!
advancements.creep_orchid_advancement.de: Harvest a Creep Flower using a Leather Glove.
advancements.creep_orchid_bundle_advance: Craft some Creep Orchid Bundles to annoy the Gnome King.
advancements.defeating_gnome.title: Are you proud now?
advancements.energy_ball_advancement.des: Obtain an Energy Ball from an Exaustum Allium.
advancements.interact_with_festive_gnome: Summon a Festive Gnome using cookies or milk on a Brick Fireplace and talk to him to learn more...
advancements.obtain_blood_rose.descr: Harvest a Blood Rose using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtain_blood_rose.title: Vampirism in a plant?!
Harvest a Bubblis using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtain_cloudelion_advanceme: Harvest a Cloudelion using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtain_ember_weed_advanceme: Harvest an Ember Weed using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtain_gnomish_sewing_machi: Obtain a Gnomish Sewing Machine from the Gnome King.
advancements.obtain_spider_queen_eye_adv: Defeat the Spider Queen and obtain her loot bag as a reward.
advancements.obtain_spider_queen_silk_th: Obtain a Spider Queen's Silk Thread.
advancements.obtaining_blood_advancement: Obtain a Blood Bottle from a Blood Rose.
advancements.obtaining_brambleroot_advan: Harvest a Brambleroot using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtaining_bucket_of_acid_ad: Scoop up some Acid using a Bucket!
advancements.obtaining_chrysite_string.d: Obtain a Chrysite String by using some Molten Amethyst on a Cobweb or finding a Chrysite Cobweb in the depths of a mineshaft...
advancements.obtaining_exaustum_allium.d: Harvest an Exaustum Allium using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtaining_glow_fungus.descr: Harvest a Glow Fungus using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtaining_glow_fungus.title: Light of the Caves
advancements.obtaining_gnome_hat.descr: Obtain a Gnome Hat from a Gnome.
advancements.obtaining_gnome_hat.title: Hat Thief
advancements.obtaining_gnome_king_den_ke: Defeat the Gnome King and Obtain his loot bag.
advancements.obtaining_gold_mushroom_adv: Find some Golden Mushrooms on a Stick and consume some.
advancements.obtaining_hungry_grass.desc: Harvest a Hungry Grass using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtaining_mixed_soil_pot_ad: Obtain a Mixed Soil Pot Block.
advancements.obtaining_philosophers_ston: Create a Philosopher's Stone using Blood, Energy and a Diamond.
advancements.obtaining_toxic_cap.descr: Harvest a Toxic Cap using a Leather Glove.
advancements.obtaining_toxic_cap.title: Poisonous Mine
advancements.play_during_the_festive_mon: Play during the month of Festivities with Alchemist's Garden loaded in!
advancements.sthirn_bush_advancement.des: Harvest a Sthirn Bush using a Leather Glove.
advancements.summon_frost_army_advanceme: Summon the Frost Army by blowing into a Yeti Antler Horn while interacting with a Brick Fireplace.
advancements.summon_spider_queen_advance: Summon the Spider Queen using a King's Shovel on a special Keyhole that can be found in the Spider Pit Dungeon!
advancements.trade_with_festive_gnome_ad: Trade with a Festive Gnome and obtain his sack!
advancements.unlocking_gnome_king_den_ad: Unlock the Gnome King Den by using a magical key!
advancements.unlocking_spider_pit_treasu: Unlock the Spider Queen's Treasure room using a Spider Key.
block.alchemists_garden.blood_rose.descr: §7A thorny rose that grows in the Overworld. They collect a small amount of blood of anyone passing through a path of these. The blood can then be collected in a glass bottle.
block.alchemists_garden.brambleroot.desc: §7Some strange thorny roots that sprout from the ground. Can be found inside of Deserts or Taigas.
§7Used to summon the Festive Gnome and the Frost Army.
block.alchemists_garden.bubblis.descript: §7A plant that grows on beaches. This plant produces its own oxygen and water.
block.alchemists_garden.cloudelion.descr: §7This plant originates from the End. Seeds of this plant were transported by Endermen into the Overworld. This plant forms its own cloud to protect itself.
block.alchemists_garden.creeper_orchid.d: §7An explosive plant that originates from the Overworld. No matter from which side you look at it it will always feel as though it's staring in your soul...
block.alchemists_garden.ember_weed.descr: §7An invasive species that originates from the Nether. Sets anything that walks through it on fire.
block.alchemists_garden.empty_gnome_burr: §7Can be created using a Gnome Shovel.
§7A flower that is slowly drying up in the isolated deserts. It will take any chances to absorb the energy of those who interact with this plant. Occasionally produces Energy Balls.
block.alchemists_garden.glow_fungus.desc: §7A strange variant of fungus that grows on rocky surfaces.
block.alchemists_garden.hungry_grass.des: §7Cursed grass that will grant anyone who interact with this plant an insatiable hunger. Feeding this plant can produce consumable mulch which allows you to convert food items that replenish low hunger to mulch which replenished twice as much hunger.
block.alchemists_garden.mixed_soil.descr: §7Allows you to plant any magical plants on it.
block.alchemists_garden.mixed_soil_pot.d: §7Allows you to grow any magical plants.
block.alchemists_garden.sthirn_bush.desc: §7A Slimy bush that spawns in swamps. Slows down anything that goes in contact with it.
block.alchemists_garden.toxic_cap.descri: §7A poisonous fungus that has its stem burried underground. Will explode and poison if walked on it (unless the entity is wearing Leather Boots).
block.alchemists_garden.webby_keyhole.de: §7Insert the King's Shovel to summon the Spider Queen!
item.alchemists_garden.alpha_shroom_loot: §7Contains oddities dropped by the Alpha Shroom. WARNING: Contains a lot of items open with an empty inventory.
item.alchemists_garden.alpha_shroom_staf: §7Summons a Red Shroom to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.baby_yeti_staff.d: §7Summons two Baby Yetis to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.bezoar_stone.desc: §7A pearl with magical properties. Obtained from the stomach of a sheep by feeding it some Sthirn Bushes. Removes any poison effects and applies regeneration.
item.alchemists_garden.blood_bottle.desc: §7A bottle of fresh blood harvested from the petals of a Blood Rose.
item.alchemists_garden.brambler.descript: §7Has a chance to summon some Brambleroot from the ground under your target.
item.alchemists_garden.broken_baby_yeti_: §7Assemble 2 of these Broken Staves to repair the Baby Yeti Staff. An old tome written by an unknown summoner states that only the blood of an ally or opponent has the power to assemble a broken staff.
item.alchemists_garden.broken_spiderling: §7Assemble 3 of these Broken Staves to repair the Spiderling Staff. An old tome written by an unknown summoner states that only the blood of an ally or opponent has the power to assemble a broken staff.
item.alchemists_garden.brown_shroom_staf: §7Summons a Brown Shroom to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.bucket_of_acid.de: §7It is recommended that you don't touch acid...
item.alchemists_garden.chrysite_string.d: §7Use some Molten Amethyst on a Cobweb to create a Chrysite Cobweb!
item.alchemists_garden.cloudelion_boots_: §7Allows you to control the levitation of the cloudelions! Sneak to rise yourself in the skies!
§7Those boots require you to have Cloudelions in your inventory to work and will slowly consume them.
item.alchemists_garden.creep_orchid_bund: §7Interact with a Royal Burrow while holding this to challenge the Gnome King!
item.alchemists_garden.energy_ball.descr: §7A ball of energy produced by the Exaustum Allium. Can be consumed to gain some of that energy back.
item.alchemists_garden.ent_staff.descrip: §7Summons an Ent to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.festive_gnome_hat: §7An exclusive item obtained from the Santa's Sack.
item.alchemists_garden.fire_resistance_r: §7A magical ring that buffs surrounding minions with a Fire Resistance effect.
item.alchemists_garden.frost_army_loot_b: §7Contains oddities dropped by the Frost Army Effigy. WARNING: Contains a lot of items open with an empty inventory.
item.alchemists_garden.frozen_shroom_sta: §7Summons a Frozen Shroom to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.gingerbread_man_c: §7A fine cookie made of ginger decorated with a sugary frosting and gumdrops... A classic festive cookie.
item.alchemists_garden.glittering_spores: §7Gilded Spores that are used to upgrade and repair rare equipment.
§7A magical ring that applies a Glowing effect to surrounding minions making them more detectable and easier to find.
item.alchemists_garden.gnome_king_den_ke: §7A magical little key that unlocks the gate of the Gnome King Den.
item.alchemists_garden.gnome_king_loot_b: §7Contains oddities dropped by the Gnome King. WARNING: Contains a lot of items open with an empty inventory.
item.alchemists_garden.gnome_shovel.desc: §7It is unknown how the Gnomes managed to modify an iron shovel to allow them to dig their burrows. This shovel is only effective to mine dirt-like blocks and can create empty burrows with a sneak + right-click!
item.alchemists_garden.gnome_staff.descr: §7Summons a Gnome to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.gnomes_brew.descr: §7A strange drink made by Gnomes. Grants Slowness and Haste effects.
item.alchemists_garden.gnomish_sewing_ma: §7Used to craft different Gnome armor. Obtained from the Gnome King.
item.alchemists_garden.golden_mushrooms_: §7Sweet and tasty. Grants Resistance and Regeneration when consumed. The recipe of this delicacy is unknown but can be found scattered around the Overworld.
item.alchemists_garden.golden_ring.descr: §7Used as a base to create magical ring... or as a way to propose to someone...
item.alchemists_garden.high_quality_mulc: §7High quality mulch produced by feeding Hungry Grass. Can be eaten to restore a lot of hunger.
item.alchemists_garden.ice_giant_head_st: §7Summons an Ice Giant Head to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.kings_shovel.desc: §7An artifact that belonged to the Gnome King. Very fast shovel that can create explosions if you're sneaking while mining blocks.
§cThis item can be used as a key to liberate a beast...
item.alchemists_garden.leather_glove.des: §7An essential tool used by gardeners to harvest magical plants without activating their effects.
item.alchemists_garden.live_gingerbread_: §7Summons a Gingerbread man that will follow you around and grant a Saturation buff randomly.
item.alchemists_garden.low_quality_mulch: §7Low quality mulch produced by feeding Hungry Grass. Can be eaten to restore a bit of hunger.
item.alchemists_garden.medium_quality_mu: §7Medium quality mulch produced by feeding Hungry Grass. Can be eaten to restore some hunger.
item.alchemists_garden.molten_amethyst.d: §7Smelt an Amethyst Shard inside of a furnace to create this item. Use this on a Cobweb to transform it into a Chrysite Cobweb.
item.alchemists_garden.mortar_and_pestle: §7Used by alchemists to crush different herbs / flowers and raw ingredients to obtain other items.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_axe.d: §7Has a chance to poison your target for a small amount of time.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_hoe.d: §7Has a chance to poison your target for a small amount of time.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_ingot: §7A chunk made out of spores and mushroom. Used as a powerful material in smithing.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_picka: §7Has a chance to poison your target for a small amount of time.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_shove: §7Has a chance to poison your target for a small amount of time.
item.alchemists_garden.mushroomite_sword: §7Has a chance to poison your target for a small amount of time.
§7A strange letter addressed to you inside of a reinforced mushroom spore package.

§7§o"I do not have much time but to whoever finds this letter please stop them... I'm surrounded. There's too much of them... I've laid out all the knowledge I had in the "Alchemist's Garden" advancements tab... Please stop them before it's too late."
item.alchemists_garden.philosophers_ston: §7A powerful crystal made out of crystallized blood. Can convert Iron into Gold and Gold into Iron.
item.alchemists_garden.purplish_bezoar_s: §7An improved Bezoar Stone. Obtained from combining a Spider Queen eye with a Bezoar Stone on a Smithing Table. Removes any poison effects and applies regeneration.
item.alchemists_garden.queens_fang.descr: §7Has a chance to create an Acid Puddle under your target. Obtained from the Spider Queen.
item.alchemists_garden.queens_pocket_mir: §7Quite dusty. "How could the Spider Queen even use this? No. It can't be. Something is off..." Consumes energy balls to apply Night Vision.
§7§o"Property of the Queen" is scrapped in a small text on the back.
item.alchemists_garden.raw_mushrooms_on_: §7A great snack in the woods. Not the best as raw but still edible.
§7Summons a Red Shroom to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.regeneration_ring: §7A magical ring that buffs surrounding minions with a Regeneration effect.
item.alchemists_garden.resistance_ring.d: §7A magical ring that buffs surrounding minions with a Resistance effect.
item.alchemists_garden.snowflake.descrip: §7A pile of frosted snowflakes obtained by killing enemies from a Frost Army. Can be used to trade with a Festive Gnome.
item.alchemists_garden.speed_ring.descri: §7A magical ring that buffs surrounding minions with a Speed effect.
item.alchemists_garden.spider_hunter_boo: §7Removes fall damage underground & breaks cobwebs that are walked into while granting a speed bonus. Once worn by Gnome Spider Hunters back when the Spider Queen was ruling the Overworld...
item.alchemists_garden.spider_key.descri: §7A strange key shaped like a spider... Unlocks the Spider Queen's treasure room.
§7An eye stolen from the Queen of spiders...
item.alchemists_garden.spider_queen_loot: §7Contains oddities dropped by the Spider Queen. WARNING: Contains a lot of items open with an empty inventory.
item.alchemists_garden.spider_queens_sil: §7A silk thread that was personally woven by the Spider Queen. Used to craft armor.
§7Summons three Spiderlings to aid you in combat!
item.alchemists_garden.strenght_ring.des: §7A magical ring that buffs surrounding minions with a Strenght effect.
item.alchemists_garden.unpowered_kings_s: §7An artifact that belonged to the Gnome King. Very fast shovel that can create explosions if you're sneaking while mining blocks.
§7Blow into the horn while interacting with a Brick Fireplace to summon the Frost Army.
item.alchemists_garden.yeti_staff.descri: §7Summons a Yeti to aid you in combat!
